00061 extern U8   code *pbuffer;
00062 extern U8   data_to_transfer;
00063 extern S_line_coding   line_coding;
00064 extern S_line_status line_status;
00065 
00066 
00067 // We buffer the old state as it is wize only to send this interrupt message if
00068 // sstate has changed.
00069 extern S_serial_state serial_state;         // actual state
00070 static S_serial_state serial_state_saved;   // buffered previously sent state
00071 volatile U8 usb_request_break_generation=FALSE;
00072

00084 Bool usb_user_read_request(U8 type, U8 request)
00085 {
00086    U16 wValue;
00087 
00088    LSB(wValue) = Usb_read_byte();
00089    MSB(wValue) = Usb_read_byte();
00090 
00091    if( USB_SETUP_SET_CLASS_INTER == type )
00092    {
00093       switch( request )
00094       {
00095          case SETUP_CDC_SET_LINE_CODING:
00096          cdc_set_line_coding();
00097          return TRUE;
00098          break;
00099    
00100          case SETUP_CDC_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE:
00101          cdc_set_control_line_state(wValue); // according cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.2.14
00102          return TRUE;
00103          break;
00104    
00105          case SETUP_CDC_SEND_BREAK:
00106          cdc_send_break(wValue);             // wValue contains break lenght
00107          return TRUE;
00108          break;
00109       }
00110    }
00111    if( USB_SETUP_GET_CLASS_INTER == type )
00112    {
00113       switch( request )
00114       {
00115          case SETUP_CDC_GET_LINE_CODING:
00116          cdc_get_line_coding();
00117          return TRUE;
00118          break;
00119       }
00120    }
00121    return FALSE;  // No supported request
00122 }

00134    return FALSE;

00142 void usb_user_endpoint_init(U8 conf_nb)
00143 {
00144   usb_configure_endpoint(INT_EP,      \
00145                          TYPE_INTERRUPT,     \
00146                          DIRECTION_IN,  \
00147                          SIZE_32,       \
00148                          ONE_BANK,     \
00149                          NYET_ENABLED);
00150 
00151   usb_configure_endpoint(TX_EP,      \
00152                          TYPE_BULK,  \
00153                          DIRECTION_IN,  \
00154                          SIZE_32,     \
00155                          ONE_BANK,     \
00156                          NYET_ENABLED);
00157 
00158   usb_configure_endpoint(RX_EP,      \
00159                          TYPE_BULK,     \
00160                          DIRECTION_OUT,  \
00161                          SIZE_32,       \
00162                          ONE_BANK,     \
00163                          NYET_ENABLED);
00164 
00165   Usb_reset_endpoint(INT_EP);
00166   Usb_reset_endpoint(TX_EP);
00167   Usb_reset_endpoint(RX_EP);
00168 
00169 
00170 }
00171 
00180 void cdc_get_line_coding(void)
00181 {
00182      Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00183      Usb_write_byte(LSB0(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00184      Usb_write_byte(LSB1(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00185      Usb_write_byte(LSB2(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00186      Usb_write_byte(LSB3(line_coding.dwDTERate));
00187      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bCharFormat);
00188      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bParityType);
00189      Usb_write_byte(line_coding.bDataBits);
00190 
00191      Usb_send_control_in();
00192      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00193      //Usb_clear_tx_complete();
00194 
00195    while(!Is_usb_receive_out());
00196    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00197 }
00198 
00199 
00208 void cdc_set_line_coding (void)
00209 {
00210    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00211    while (!(Is_usb_receive_out()));
00212    LSB0(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00213    LSB1(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00214    LSB2(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00215    LSB3(line_coding.dwDTERate) = Usb_read_byte();
00216    line_coding.bCharFormat = Usb_read_byte();
00217    line_coding.bParityType = Usb_read_byte();
00218    line_coding.bDataBits = Usb_read_byte();
00219      Usb_ack_receive_out();
00220 
00221      Usb_send_control_in();                // send a ZLP for STATUS phase
00222      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00223 #ifdef UART_U2
00224    Uart_set_baudrate((line_coding.dwDTERate)/2);
00225 #else
00226    Uart_set_baudrate(line_coding.dwDTERate);
00227 #endif
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00241 void cdc_set_control_line_state (U16 state)
00242 {
00243      Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00244    Usb_send_control_in();
00245    line_status.all = state;
00246    
00247      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00248 
00249 }
00250 
00263 Bool cdc_update_serial_state()
00264 {
00265    if( serial_state_saved.all != serial_state.all)
00266    {
00267       serial_state_saved.all = serial_state.all;
00268       
00269       Usb_select_endpoint(INT_EP);
00270       if (Is_usb_write_enabled())
00271       {
00272          Usb_write_byte(USB_SETUP_GET_CLASS_INTER);   // bmRequestType
00273          Usb_write_byte(SETUP_CDC_BN_SERIAL_STATE);   // bNotification
00274          
00275          Usb_write_byte(0x00);   // wValue (zero)
00276          Usb_write_byte(0x00);
00277          
00278          Usb_write_byte(0x00);   // wIndex (Interface)
00279          Usb_write_byte(0x00);
00280          
00281          Usb_write_byte(0x02);   // wLength (data count = 2)
00282          Usb_write_byte(0x00);
00283          
00284          Usb_write_byte(LSB(serial_state.all));   // data 0: LSB first of serial state
00285          Usb_write_byte(MSB(serial_state.all));   // data 1: MSB follows
00286          Usb_ack_in_ready();
00287       }
00288       return TRUE;
00289    }
00290    return FALSE;
00291 }
00292 
00303 void cdc_send_break(U16 break_duration)
00304 {
00305      Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00306    Usb_send_control_in();
00307    usb_request_break_generation=TRUE;
00308    
00309      while(!(Is_usb_read_control_enabled()));
00310 
00311 }
